casebody.data:
FOLKES et al. v. MITCHELL. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. December 18, 1922.) No. 91. O. D. Batchelor, of New York City, for plaintiffs in error. Bandler & Haas, of New York City (John E. Collins, of New York City, of counsel), for defendant in error.

Before HOUGH, MANTON, and MAYER, Circuit Judges.

' PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed, with costs.
